about.name: Cubu
about.desc: Cubu is a platform that streamlines the customer journey, both in-branch and online. The complete toolkit for running and optimizing customer service in your organization.

projectTeam.desc: This landing page redesign project consisted of a product designer and it took 2 weeks to design.

problem.desc: The existing landing page failed to present Cubu's features in an organized and visually appealing manner. The lack of a clean layout made it challenging for users to understand the services and features at a glance.

goals.title: Highlight Key Features
goals.desc: Showcase Cubu's appointment and queue management services clearly and effectively.

goals.title: Create a Minimal and Engaging UI
goals.desc: Develop a clean, visually appealing interface that enhances user understanding and experience.

solution.desc: Incorporated graphics and animations to explain services in a user-friendly manner. Multiple iterations were done to refine sections based on client feedback, ensuring clarity and engagement.

behindTheScenes.researchAndInspiration: Analyzed layouts and designs from various sources to identify best practices for presenting services graphically.
behindTheScenes.iterations: Created several versions of different sections of the landing page and refined them based on client feedback.
behindTheScenes.featureCommunication: Used visuals, animations, graphics, and clean layouts to simplify the understanding of key features like Smart Calendar, Online Self-Booking, and Time Slot Management.

ui.approach: Adopted a clean, clutter-free design to make the content stand out with visuals to provide clear communication of features and improve usability.
ui.colors: Used purple as the primary color, with blue, yellow, and peach as secondary colors, aligning with the client’s branding.
ui.typography: The font 'Plus Jakarta' was used for its modern and minimal vibe, complementing the clean aesthetic.

achievements: The redesign successfully presented Cubu's features in a clear, visually appealing format, making the services easy to understand for users.
By combining minimal design, animations, and client feedback, a landing page was delivered that effectively communicates Cubu’s offerings while enhancing user experience.

clientFeedback.desc: The new design improves usability and enhances Cubu's image as a reliable platform for managing customer service.
